title: Coherent Variational Quantum Linear Solver
seoDescription: This demonstration extends the variational quantum linear solver to solve linear equations defined by a probabilistic coherent operation.

references.title: Variational Quantum Linear Solver: A Hybrid Algorithm for Linear Systems
references.authors: Carlos Bravo-Prieto, Ryan LaRose, Marco Cerezo, Yigit Subasi, Lukasz Cincio, Patrick J. Coles

references.title: Efficient algorithms in quantum query complexity
